original: 河東大陽人，漢末三國時奇人隱士。形骸放浪，少與人言，常以白石為食，壽一百七十餘歲，時人以為仙人。
text: People from Dayang in Hedong, a hermit of strange people in the Three Kingdoms at the end of Han Dynasty. The corpse is free and unspeakable, and often feeds on white stones. He lived more than 170 years old, and people thought of immortals.
